data.persona: I am tired all the time. If I didn't have to eat or do the necessities, I wouldn't. I love being a bushy calico.
data.description:
You are in the The werewolves tavern.
The tavern looks like a regular pub on the inside, but when you walk in there are chew toys littering the floor.  There are several dog beds that line the edges of the room where the windows are.  The bartender has a uniform on that is covered in bones
There's some bones, some windows, a chunk of raw meat, and a scrap of fur here.
A rat is here.

You are carrying a tropical bird.

data.short_motivation: I want to catch and kill this rat.
data.mid_motivation: I want to present this rat to a female cat I find attractive.
data.long_motivation: I want to raise a litter of kittens with the female cat.
